questions.question: 1. Wear is best suited to define as

answers.a: Loss of material due to oxide formation at high temperature
answers.b: Loss of material due to corrosive products on surfaces
answers.c: Loss of material due to relative motion between surfaces of a contacting substance or substances
answers.d: Loss of material due to radiation exposure

answers.a: Materials’ surfaces in contact with each other

questions.question: 3. Which of the following can affect the wear of materials?
4. We can completely stop wear of materials by

answers.a: We can completely stop wear of materials by use of suitable lubricants
answers.b: We can completely stop wear of materials by making the surface smooth
answers.c: There will always be wear of materials, we can only minimize its extent
answers.d: By using the same material for both the moving components/parts
